H0.text: If a cricket match is curtailed because of inclement weather, what system is used to determine a result. Rain Rule

H1.text: If a cricket match is curtailed because of inclement weather, what system is used to determine a result. Weather Adjustment System

H2.text: If a cricket match is curtailed because of inclement weather, what system is used to determine a result. Cricket Match Resolver

H3.text: If a cricket match is curtailed because of inclement weather, what system is used to determine a result. DL Method

A4.text: This refined method remains the standard for handling rain-affected matches in international cricket today.

A5.text: The D/L method is an attempt to set a statistically fair target for the second team's innings.
